id237.cndescription: 选择一个效果 - 获得2颗法力水晶；或者抽3张牌。

id238.name: Druid of the Claw
id238.cndescription: 选择一个效果 - 冲锋；或者+2生命，获得嘲讽。
id238.description: Choose One - Charge; or +2 Health and Taunt.

id241.name: Druid of the Claw
id241.cndescription: 选择一个效果 - 冲锋；或者+2生命，获得嘲讽。

id242.name: Druid of the Claw
id242.cndescription: 选择一个效果 - 冲锋；或者+2生命，获得嘲讽。

id243.name: Keeper of the Grove
id243.cndescription: 选择一个效果 - 造成2点伤害；或者沉默1名仆从。
id243.description: Choose One - Deal 2 damage; or Silence a minion.

id246.name: Innervate
id246.cndescription: 在本回合内，获得2颗法力水晶。
id246.description: Gain 2 Mana Crystals this turn only.

id247.name: Emperor Cobra
id247.cndescription: 摧毁任何受到此仆从伤害的仆从。
id247.description: Destroy any minion damaged by this minion.

id249.name: Ancient of War
id249.cndescription: 选择一个效果 - 战争古树获得+5生命和嘲讽；或者获得+5攻击。
id249.description: Choose One - Ancient of War gets +5 Health and Taunt; or +5 Attack.

id256.name: Earth Shock
id256.cndescription: 沉默1个仆从，并对其造成1点伤害。
id256.description: Silence a minion, then deal 1 damage to it.

id257.name: Hex
id257.cndescription: 将1个仆从变成1只会嘲讽的0/1青蛙。
id257.description: Transform a minion into a 0/1 Frog with Taunt.

id259.name: Feral Spirit
id259.cndescription: 召唤2头会嘲讽的2/3幽灵狼。过载：（2）
id259.description: Summon two 2/3 Spirit Wolves with Taunt. Overload (2)

id260.name: Baron Geddon
id260.cndescription: 在你回合结束时，对其他所有角色造成2点伤害。
id260.description: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to ALL other characters.

id262.name: Forked Lightning
id262.cndescription: 随机对2个敌方仆从造成2点伤害。过载：（2）
id262.description: Deal 2 damage to 2 random enemy minions. Overload (2)

id263.name: Unbound Elemental
id263.cndescription: 每当你打出1张具有过载机制的牌，获得+1/+1。
id263.description: Whenever you play a card with Overload, gain +1/+1.

id264.name: Lightning Storm
id264.cndescription: 对所有敌人造成2-3点伤害。过载：（2）
id264.description: Deal 2-3 damage to all enemy minions. Overload (2)

id265.name: Ethereal Arcanist
id265.cndescription: 如果你在你的回合结束时依然控制着1个秘能，那么获得+2/+2。
id265.description: If you control a Secret at the end of your turn, gain +2/+2.

id266.name: Cone of Cold
id266.cndescription: 冻结1个仆从及其相邻仆从，并对它们造成1点伤害。
id266.description: Freeze a minion and the minions next to it, and deal 1 damage to them.

id267.name: Arcane Missiles
id267.cndescription: 随机向3个敌方目标射出飞弹，各造成1点伤害。
id267.description: Shoot 3 missiles at random enemies for 1 damage each.

id271.name: Azure Drake
id271.cndescription: 法术强度+1。战斗怒吼：抽1张牌。
id271.description: Spell Power +1. Battlecry Draw a card.

id272.name: Counterspell
id272.cndescription: 秘能：当你对手施放法术时，反制它。
id272.description: Secret When your opponent casts a spell, Counter it.

id273.name: Ice Barrier
id273.cndescription: 秘能：当你的英雄受到攻击时，获得8点护甲。
id273.description: Secret As soon as your hero is attacked, gain 8 Armor.

id274.name: Mirror Entity
id274.cndescription: 秘能：当你的对手打出1个仆从时，召唤1个该仆从的复制品。
id274.description: Secret When your opponent plays a minion, summon a copy of it.

id275.name: Ice Block
id275.cndescription: 秘能：当你的英雄受到致命伤害时，免除这次伤害，并使你的英雄本回合免疫。
id275.description: Secret When your hero takes fatal damage, prevent it and become Immune this turn.

id276.name: Ragnaros the Firelord
id276.cndescription: 无法攻击。在你回合结束时，随机对1名敌人造成8点伤害。
id276.description: Can't Attack. At the end of your turn, deal 8 damage to a random enemy.

id277.name: Felguard
id277.cndescription: 嘲讽。战斗怒吼：摧毁你的1颗法力水晶。
id277.description: Taunt. Battlecry Destroy one of your Mana Crystals.

id278.name: Mortal Coil
id278.cndescription: 对1名仆从造成1点伤害。如果该仆从死亡，抽1张牌。
id278.description: Deal 1 damage to a minion. If that kills it, draw a card.

id279.name: Shadowflame
id279.cndescription: 摧毁1个友方仆从。对所有敌方仆从造成被摧毁仆从的攻击伤害。
id279.description: Destroy a friendly minion and deal its Attack damage to all enemy minions.

id280.name: Void Terror
id280.cndescription: 战斗怒吼：摧毁虚空惧魔两侧的仆从，使其获得它们的攻击和生命。
id280.description: Battlecry Destroy the minions on either side of this minion and gain their Attack and Health.

id281.name: Succubus
id281.cndescription: 战斗怒吼：随机弃掉1张牌。

id282.name: Soulfire
id282.cndescription: 造成4点伤害。随机弃掉1张牌。
id282.description: Deal 4 damage. Discard a random card.

id283.name: Siphon Soul
id283.cndescription: 摧毁1个仆从。为你的英雄回复3点生命。
id283.description: Destroy a minion. Restore #3 Health to your hero.

id284.name: Doomguard
id284.cndescription: 冲锋。战斗怒吼：随机弃掉2张牌。
id284.description: Charge. Battlecry Discard two random cards.

id286.name: Pit Lord
id286.cndescription: 战斗怒吼：对你的英雄造成7点伤害。
id286.description: Battlecry Deal 7 damage to your hero.

id287.name: Summoning Portal
id287.cndescription: 你的仆从消耗降低（2），但不会低于（1）。
id287.description: Your minions cost (2) less, but not less than (1).

id288.name: Power Overwhelming
id288.cndescription: 在本回合结束前，使1名友方仆从获得+4/+4。然后它会死，死得很惨。
id288.description: Give a friendly minion +4/+4 until end of turn. Then, it dies. Horribly.

id289.name: Sense Demons
id289.cndescription: 从你的卡堆里随机抽取2张恶魔加入你的手牌。
id289.description: Put 2 random Demons from your deck into your hand.

id290.name: Worthless Imp
id290.cndescription: 你没有恶魔了！好在总有小鬼在……
id290.description: You are out of demons! At least there are always imps...

id291.name: Flame Imp
id291.cndescription: 战斗怒吼：对你的英雄造成2点伤害。
id291.description: Battlecry Deal 2 damage to your hero.

id292.name: Bane of Doom
id292.cndescription: 对1个角色造成2点伤害。如果该角色死亡，则随机召唤1个恶魔。
id292.description: Deal 2 damage to a character. If that kills it, summon a random Demon.

id293.name: Lord Jaraxxus
id293.cndescription: 战斗怒吼：摧毁你的英雄，加拉克苏斯大王会取而代之。
id293.description: Battlecry Destroy your hero and replace him with Lord Jaraxxus.

id294.name: Lord Jaraxxus
id294.cndescription: 战斗怒吼：摧毁你的英雄，加拉克苏斯大王会取而代之。

id297.name: Shadow Madness
id297.cndescription: 在本回合内，控制1名攻击力小于等于3的敌对仆从。
id297.description: Gain control of an enemy minion with 3 or less Attack until end of turn.

id298.name: Lightspawn
id298.cndescription: 这个仆从的攻击和生命相等。
id298.description: This minion's Attack is always equal to its Health.

id299.name: Thoughtsteal
id299.cndescription: 从你对手的卡堆里随机复制2张牌，将它们放入自己手牌。
id299.description: Copy 2 cards from your opponent's deck and put them into your hand.

id300.name: Lightwell
id300.cndescription: 在你回合开始时，为1名受伤友方仆从回复3点生命。
id300.description: At the start of your turn, restore 3 Health to a damaged friendly character.

id301.name: Mindgames
id301.cndescription: 从你对手的卡堆里随机复制1名仆从，并将其放入战场。
id301.description: Put a copy of a random minion from your opponent's deck into the battlefield.

id302.name: Shadow of Nothing
id302.cndescription: 心灵游戏失效了！你的对手1个仆从也没有！
id302.description: Mindgames whiffed! Your opponent had no minions!,nameShadow of Nothing

id303.name: Divine Favor
id303.cndescription: 抽牌，直到你的手牌数量和对手相等。
id303.description: Draw cards until you have as many in hand as your opponent.

id304.name: Prophet Velen
id304.cndescription: 使你的法术治疗及伤害效果翻倍。
id304.description: Double the damage and healing of your spells.

id306.name: Blessed Champion
id306.cndescription: 使1个仆从的攻击力翻倍。

id307.name: Humility
id307.cndescription: 将1个仆从的攻击变为1点。

id308.name: Argent Protector
id308.cndescription: 战斗怒吼：使1个友方仆从获得圣盾术。
id308.description: Battlecry Give a friendly minion Divine Shield.

id309.name: Blessing of Wisdom
id309.cndescription: 选择一个仆从，当它攻击时，抽1张牌。
id309.description: Choose a minion. Whenever it attacks, draw a card.

id310.name: Holy Wrath
id310.cndescription: 抽1张牌，并造成相当于该牌消耗的伤害。
id310.description: Draw a card and deal damage equal to its cost.

id311.name: Sword of Justice
id311.cndescription: 当你召唤1个仆从时，使其获得+1/+1，并损失1点耐久。
id311.description: Whenever you summon a minion, give it +1/+1 and this loses 1 Durability.

id313.name: Repentance
id313.cndescription: 秘能：当你的对手打出1个仆从时，将该仆从生命降为1。
id313.description: Secret When your opponent plays a minion, reduce its Health to 1.

id314.name: Aldor Peacekeeper
id314.cndescription: 战斗怒吼：使1个敌对仆从的攻击变为1。
id314.description: Battlecry Change an enemy minion's Attack to 1.

id315.name: Tirion Fordring
id315.cndescription: 圣盾术。嘲讽。临死一击：装备一把5/3灰烬使者。
id315.description: Divine Shield. Taunt. Deathrattle Equip a 5/3 Ashbringer.

id317.name: Avenging Wrath
id317.cndescription: 随机对敌人射出8道飞弹，每道飞弹造成1点伤害。
id317.description: Shoot 8 missiles at random enemies for 1 damage each.

id319.name: Slam
id319.cndescription: 对1个仆从造成2点伤害。如果该仆从生还，抽1张牌。
id319.description: Deal 2 damage to a minion. If it survives, draw a card.

id320.name: Battle Rage
id320.cndescription: 有几名受伤仆从，就抽几张牌。
id320.description: Draw a card for each damaged minion.

id323.name: Arathi Weaponsmith
id323.cndescription: 战斗怒吼：装备一把2/2武器。

id325.name: Gurubashi Berserker
id325.cndescription: 这个仆从每次受到伤害，就获得+3攻击。
id325.description: Whenever this minion takes damage, gain +3 Attack.

id326.name: Whirlwind
id326.cndescription: 对所有仆从造成1点伤害。

id327.name: Armorsmith
id327.cndescription: 当1个友方仆从受到伤害时，获得1点护甲。
id327.description: Whenever a friendly minion takes damage, gain 1 Armor.

id329.name: Brawl
id329.cndescription: 摧毁所有仆从，只保留1个。（随机选择）
id329.description: Destroy all minions except one. (chosen randomly)

id330.name: Mortal Strike
id330.cndescription: 造成4点伤害。如果你英雄血量少于等于12点，那么造成6点伤害取而代之。
id330.description: Deal 4 damage. If your hero has 12 or less Health, deal 6 damage instead.

id331.name: Upgrade!
id331.description: If you have a weapon, give it +1/+1. Otherwise equip a 1/3 weapon.

id333.name: Shield Slam
id333.cndescription: 对1个仆从造成伤害，伤害值为你的护甲值。
id333.description: Deal 1 damage to a minion for each Armor you have.

id334.name: Gorehowl
id334.cndescription: 攻击仆从时消耗1点攻击，而不消耗耐久。
id334.description: Attacking a minion costs 1 Attack instead of 1 Durability.

id337.name: Murloc Tidehunter
id337.cndescription: 战斗怒吼：召唤1个1/1鱼人斥候。

id340.name: Grimscale Oracle
id340.cndescription: 其他所有鱼人获得+1攻击。

id341.name: Murloc Tidecaller
id341.cndescription: 每召唤1只鱼人，获得+1攻击。
id341.description: Whenever a Murloc is summoned, gain +1 Attack.

id342.name: Patient Assassin
id342.cndescription: 潜行。摧毁任何被本仆从伤害过的仆从。
id342.description: Stealth. Destroy any minion damaged by this minion.

id344.name: Misdirection
id344.cndescription: 秘能：当一个角色攻击你的英雄时，让他随机攻击另外一个角色取而代之。
id344.description: Secret When a character attacks your hero, instead he attacks another random character.

id347.name: Eaglehorn Bow
id347.cndescription: 每触发1个秘能，获得+1耐久。
id347.description: Whenever a Secret is revealed, gain +1 Durability.

id348.name: Explosive Shot
id348.cndescription: 对1个仆从造成5点伤害，并对相邻目标造成2点伤害。
id348.description: Deal 5 damage to a minion and 2 damage to adjacent ones.

id349.name: Unleash the Hounds
id349.cndescription: 使你的野兽获得+1攻击以及冲锋。
id349.description: Give your Beasts +1 Attack and Charge.

id350.name: Kill Command
id350.cndescription: 造成3点伤害。如果你有野兽，那么造成5点伤害取而代之。
id350.description: Deal 3 damage. If you have a Beast, deal 5 damage instead.

id352.name: Flare
id352.cndescription: 使所有仆从失去潜行效果。摧毁敌方所有秘能。抽1张牌。
id352.description: All minions lose Stealth. Destroy all enemy Secrets. Draw a card.

id353.name: Bestial Wrath
id353.cndescription: 在本回合内，使1个野兽获得+2攻击和免疫。
id353.description: Give a Beast +2 Attack and Immune this turn.

id354.name: Snake Trap
id354.cndescription: 秘能：当你的1个仆从遭到攻击时，召唤3条1/1毒蛇。
id354.description: Secret When one of your minions is attacked, summon three 1/1 Snakes.

id356.name: Harvest Golem
id356.cndescription: 临死一击：召唤1个2/1损坏的傀儡。

id357.name: Nat Pagle
id357.cndescription: 在你回合结束时，有50%几率抽1张牌。
id357.description: At the end of your turn, you have a 50% chance to draw a card.

id358.name: Harrison Jones
id358.cndescription: 战斗怒吼：摧毁敌人的武器，并抽取相当于武器耐久数量的牌。
id358.description: Battlecry Destroy your opponent's weapon and draw cards equal to its Durability.

id359.name: Archmage Antonidas
id359.cndescription: 你每施放1个法术，将一枚火球术放入你的手牌。
id359.description: Whenever you cast a spell, put a 'Fireball' spell into your hand.

id360.name: Nozdormu
id360.cndescription: 玩家的回合时间只有15秒。
id360.description: Players only have 15 seconds to take their turns.

id361.name: Alexstrasza
id361.cndescription: 战斗怒吼：将1名英雄的剩余生命值设为15。
id361.description: Battlecry Set a hero's remaining Health to 15.

id362.name: Onyxia
id362.cndescription: 战斗怒吼：召唤1/1雏龙，直到填满己方战场。
id362.description: Battlecry Summon 1/1 Whelps until your side of the battlefield is full.

id364.name: Faceless Manipulator
id364.cndescription: 战斗怒吼：选择一个仆从，成为它的复制品。
id364.description: Battlecry Choose a minion and become a copy of it.

id367.name: Bite
id367.cndescription: 使你的英雄获得4点护甲，并在本回合内获得+4攻击。
id367.description: Give your hero +4 Attack this turn and 4 Armor.

id368.name: Force of Nature
id368.cndescription: 召唤3个会冲锋的2/2树人，本回合结束时它们就会死亡。
id368.description: Summon three 2/2 Treants with Charge that die at the end of the turn.

id369.name: Ysera
id369.cndescription: 在你回合结束时，抽1张梦境牌。
id369.description: At the end of your turn, draw a Dream Card.

id370.name: Cenarius
id370.cndescription: 选择一个效果 - 使你的其他仆从获得+2/+2；或者召唤2个会嘲讽的2/2树人。
id370.description: Choose One - Give your other minions +2/+2; or Summon two 2/2 Treants with Taunt.

id374.name: Mana Tide Totem
id374.cndescription: 在你回合结束时，抽1张牌。
id374.description: At the end of your turn, draw a card.

id375.name: The Beast
id375.cndescription: 临死一击：为你的对手召唤1个3/3芬克・恩霍尔
id375.description: Deathrattle Summon a 3/3 Finkle Einhorn for your opponent.

id376.name: Savagery
id376.cndescription: 对所有敌方仆从造成相当于你英雄攻击的伤害。
id376.description: Deal damage equal to your hero's Attack to all enemy minions.

id377.name: Sap
id377.cndescription: 让1个敌方仆从返回到所有者手中。
id377.description: Return an enemy minion to its owner's hand.

id379.name: Priestess of Elune
id379.cndescription: 战斗怒吼：为你的英雄回复4点生命。
id379.description: Battlecry Restore 4 Health to your hero.

id380.name: Ancient Mage
id380.cndescription: 战斗怒吼：使相邻仆从获得法术强度+1
id380.description: Battlecry Give adjacent minions Spell Power +1.

id381.name: Sea Giant
id381.cndescription: 消耗降低，其数值相当于战场上其他仆从的数量。
id381.description: Costs (1) less for each other minion on the battlefield.

id382.name: Windspeaker
id382.cndescription: 战斗怒吼：使1个友方仆从获得风怒。
id382.description: Battlecry Give a friendly minion Windfury.

id383.name: Blood Knight
id383.cndescription: 战斗怒吼：使所有仆从失去圣盾术，每少1个圣盾术，获得1次+3/+3。
id383.description: Battlecry All minions lose Divine Shield. Gain +3/+3 for each Shield lost.

id384.name: Auchenai Soulpriest
id384.cndescription: 你产生治疗效果的法术卡和能力现在转而造成伤害。
id384.description: Your cards and powers that restore Health now deal damage instead.

id385.name: Nightblade
id385.cndescription: 战斗怒吼：对敌方英雄造成3点伤害。
id385.description: Battlecry Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero.

id386.name: Vaporize
id386.cndescription: 秘能：当1个仆从攻击你的英雄时，摧毁它。
id386.description: Secret When a minion attacks your hero, destroy it.

id387.name: Cult Master
id387.cndescription: 当你其他仆从死亡时，抽1张牌。
id387.description: Whenever one of your other minions dies, draw a card.

id388.name: Demonfire
id388.cndescription: 对1名仆从造成2点伤害。如果是友方恶魔，则使其获得+2/+2取而代之。
id388.description: Deal 2 damage to a minion. If itu2019s a friendly Demon, give it +2/+2 instead.

id389.name: Imp Master
id389.cndescription: 在你回合结束时，对本仆从造成1点伤害，并召唤1个1/1小鬼。
id389.description: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to this minion and summon a 1/1 Imp.

id391.name: Cruel Taskmaster
id391.cndescription: 战斗怒吼：对1名仆从造成1点伤害，并使其获得+2攻击。
id391.description: Battlecry Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it +2 Attack.

id392.name: Frothing Berserker
id392.cndescription: 当1个仆从受到伤害时，获得+1攻击。
id392.description: Whenever a minion takes damage, gain +1 Attack.

id394.name: Inner Rage
id394.cndescription: 对1个仆从造成1点伤害。在本回合内使其获得+2攻击。
id394.description: Deal 1 damage to a minion. It gains +2 Attack this turn.

id396.name: Snipe
id396.cndescription: 秘能：当对手打出1个仆从时，对该仆从造成4点伤害。
id396.description: Secret When your opponent plays a minion, deal 4 damage to it.

id397.name: Explosive Trap
id397.cndescription: 秘能：当你的英雄受到攻击时，对所有敌人造成2点伤害。
id397.description: Secret When your hero is attacked, deal 2 damage to all enemies.

id398.name: Freezing Trap
